name: Trailblazer (itch) (Lisianthus)
description:
A basic arcade-style game made for the GDS 1UP Jam 2022 where the theme was 'Space and Light'.

HOW 2 PLAY:

- Use the trail of light from behind your ship to catch enemies in it and destroy them, while avoiding a collision.

LEFT/RIGHT: Turn ship

UP: Accelerate ship
